settings.html: JVC CL-S500 Color 5MP digital mammography and Tomosynthesis monitors offer radiologists a unique combination of image clarity and versatile imaging capabilities. State-of-the-art CL-S500 offers high brightness, excellent uniformity, and color capabilities to help ensure accurate diagnosis, while its advanced tomosynthesis capabilities provide superior image quality under all lighting conditions.

settings.title: The Ultimate Radiology Imaging Solution for Unparalleled Versatility and Reliability
settings.content: The JVC CL-S500 is the ultimate solution for radiologists, revolutionizing medical imaging across all modalities. With its multi-modal functionality, this monitor handles Digital Mammography/Tomosynthesis, Chest, US, CT, MRI, and Pathology seamlessly.

settings.title: Unleashing the Dynamic Gamma Advantage
settings.content: Experience the unparalleled innovation of the JVC CL-S500, equipped with the patented Dynamic Gamma function. This state-of-the-art technology effortlessly distinguishes between monochrome and color image pixels, delivering each with optimal gradation. By ensuring impeccable visibility of even the finest details, the CL-S500 takes diagnostic accuracy and patient care to new heights.

settings.title: Auto Text Mode
settings.content: The JVC CL-S500 comes equipped with an innovative Auto Text Mode, addressing the common issue of excessive brightness often encountered with medical monitors. While high luminance is crucial for diagnostic image viewing, it can cause discomfort during text reading. With Auto Text Mode, the monitor intuitively adjusts brightness levels on patient lists and reporting applications, ensuring optimal readability and significantly reducing eye strain. This clever feature makes the JVC CL-S500 a well-rounded solution, catering to all aspects of a radiologist's viewing needs.

settings.title: Razor-Sharp Color Precision
settings.content: Utilizing its unique X, Y, Z, color level tracking, and color management technologies, any i3 model perfectly color-matches one another.

settings.title: Improved Diagnostic Visibility
settings.content: A contrast ratio of 2000:1 delivers crisper images and gives radiologists confidence in breast image interpretation to improve work efficiency.

settings.title: Integrated QA Solution
settings.content:
Managing the daily operation of the Radiology department is now more simplified with QA Medivisor Agentâ€™s calibration and QA standard testing capabilities, combined into an intuitive and easy-to-navigate user interface. This includes QA Medivisor Agent LE, a simplified calibration scheduling tool.
*Optional calibration kit CAL-016 is required for standard QA testing.

settings.title: Slim Design and Sleek Bezel
settings.content: The JVC CL-S500 combines simplicity and style with its sleek and slim design, perfect for a modern radiology environment. With its slim profile, this monitor adds a touch of sophistication to any workspace, enhancing the overall aesthetic.

settings.title: Protective Glass Filter
settings.content: Experience unparalleled image quality and eye comfort with the JVC CL-S500. Its top-notch anti-reflective protective glass enhances contrast, minimizes image noise, and delivers a clear, sharp picture. Designed for prolonged use, it provides a relaxing viewing experience. Moreover, this anti-reflective protective glass is more than just a screen protector; it also contributes to the cleanliness and hygiene of your workspace. The surface is easy to wipe clean, ensuring that your monitor remains sanitary in a medical environment. Elevate your radiology practice with the JVC CL-S500 for enhanced image quality, comfort, and easy cleaning in one advanced monitor solution.

settings.title: Reading Light
settings.content:
The JVC CL-S500 revolutionizes the radiology reading experience by combatting eye fatigue with its adjustable ambiance lighting solution. Equipped with a built-in Rear Light, this monitor emits a gentle ambient illumination behind the screen, creating a comfortable and strain-free working environment for radiologists.

In addition, the CL-S500 features a Reading Light that directs focused illumination onto documents and film folders, ensuring optimal visibility and comfort during intricate tasks. Both the Rear Light and Reading Light can be easily adjusted to accommodate individual preferences or room conditions. This personalized lighting approach significantly enhances well-being and productivity, establishing the JVC CL-S500 as an exceptional companion for radiology professionals. Discover the difference with this intelligently designed, user-focused radiology monitor.

settings.title: Intelligent Multi Sensor Technology
settings.content: The JVC CL-S500 includes several front sensors to adjust your monitor to fit any reading environment efficiently. An ambient light sensor offsets the effects of ambient light to ensure optimal calibration, a color front sensor stabilizes luminance and color for consistent image quality, and the human presence sensor automatically switches to power save mode when you're away.

settings.title: Wire Management / DisplayPort Daisy Chains
settings.content: With DisplayPort 1.2, daisy chains allow for more accessible wiring connections.

settings.title: Low Blue Light Panel
settings.content: The JVC CL-S500 is the perfect solution for radiologists seeking to reduce eye strain during prolonged reading sessions. Equipped with a specialized low blue light panel, this monitor prioritizes your eye health and comfort.

settings.title: Real-Time Continues DICOM and Color Adjustment
settings.content:
Experience unparalleled imaging accuracy with the JVC CL-S500, featuring a sophisticated stabilization system for luminance and color temperature. This advanced monitor boasts real-time adjustments, ensuring the most precise and accurate imaging results.

With its built-in Color Front Sensor, the CL-S500 constantly measures color temperature, allowing for immediate adjustments to any changes that may occur during prolonged usage. Unlike movable front sensors, this feature guarantees exceptional precision and adaptability over time, ensuring the monitor maintains its superior DICOM and color accuracy.

Radiologists can rely on the JVC CL-S500 to consistently provide reliable and consistent diagnostic imaging, thanks to its cutting-edge real-time continues DICOM and color adjustment capabilities. Elevate your practice with the unmatched precision and stability offered by the JVC CL-S500, setting a new standard in radiology imaging excellence.

settings.title: JVC Totoku CL-S500 5MP: Light & Modern Design
settings.content: JVC Totoku CL-S500 5MP medical display monitor masterfully balances size, weight, functionality, and ease of use. Standing at 517mm (20.3 inches) tall, 361.5mm (14.2 inches) wide, and 196.5mm (7.7 inches) deep per monitor, it provides a generous viewing area for radiologists. With a weight of 9.5kg (20.9 lbs) per monitor, the JVC Totoku CL-S500 demonstrates durability and robustness. Suitable for use in hospitals or home offices, the JVC Totoku CL-S500 5MP serves as an ideal breast imaging display for radiologists seeking the perfect mix of size, performance, and image quality.

settings.title: Ergonomic Versatility with JVC CL-S500's Adaptable Stand
settings.content: JVC Totoku CL-S500's stand is engineered for optimal usability, offering enhanced comfort and versatility. It supports tilt, swivel, and height adjustments, enabling personalized positioning of the display. Additionally, the stand comes with a connector compartment cover to conceal cables, ensuring a clean and organized workspace. Experience heightened comfort and user-friendly operation with the adaptable stand of the JVC Totoku CL-S500.

settings.title: Power Efficiency Meets Connectivity
settings.content: Designed to optimize efficiency and versatility, the JVC Totoku CL-S500 5MP is equipped with a wide range of I/O ports to facilitate seamless connectivity. It features both DisplayPort and DVI interfaces, ensuring compatibility with a broad range of systems and devices. This flexibility greatly enhances the user experience, allowing for effortless integration into various setups. Moreover, the JVC Totoku CL-S500 5MP is built with a USB hub, providing additional connectivity options for peripherals, and further contributing to its user-friendly design. But perhaps the crowning feature of CL-S500 5MP is its highly efficient power supply. This cutting-edge component provides stable, noise-free 24V power to the monitor during operation, ensuring reliable performance and clear, disturbance-free imaging. During periods of sleep or standby, it seamlessly switches to a 5V hybrid efficiency mode, thereby saving energy while maintaining the monitor's readiness for quick wake-up, exemplifying the JVC Totoku CL-S500 5MP's commitment to performance, efficiency, and sustainability.

settings.title: Low Blue Light Panel
settings.html: CL-S500 has a low blue light panel, reducing eye strain while reading.

Stable Image Representation

The luminance and color stabilization system contributes to improved image representation for an efficient reading environment.

settings.title: Docs & Drivers
